headLine: My hate level of redux: I created a new library
subHead: If you have been using recoil for a while, you might have faced it: outside React Components, it's not possible to get or update values from atoms. This Typescript implementation relying on RxJS will workaround this issue and let you do so.
author: Luis Antonio Canettoli Ordoñez
